content: #324 quick as a wink cowl designed by maureen clark this cowl practically hooks itself with an addictively fun feather stitch that you ll enjoy making and wearing it is made with an easily memorized repeat works up in a flash and creates a warm comfy fabric you may find it the ideal choice for cozy handmade gifts finished measurements 27 25 / 69 cm circumference by 8 75 / 22 cm deep gauge 14 sts & 13 row over 4 / 10 cm in feather pattern for accuracy check gauge over at least 4 in / 10 cm and adjust hook size as needed materials yarn 2 skeins alpaca elegance cotton comfort sylvan spirit or mewesic 180 yds hook us size i/ 5 5 mm glossary foundation chain- https //youtu be/wawl0witqpg single_crochet- single_crochet chain- chain st half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet feather st- *yo insert hook in same chain-1 space as last st yo and draw through a loop yo insert hook in previous row s half_double_crochet yo and draw through a loop yo insert hook in next chain-1 space yo and draw through a loop yo and draw through all 7 loops on the hook chain 1 repeat from * feather st is worked the same on both front and back row here is a good look at the 3 steps of the feather st https //i pinimg com/564x/67/da/db/67dadbef11e884354d93ec3cd2ec035e jpg instructions create 97sc with a foundation chain turn work into the edge with the longer loops row 1 half_double_crochet in each single_crochet chain 1 turn row 2 *half_double_crochet chain 1 skip next single_crochet from previous row repeat from * across turn row 3 & 4 half_double_crochet in first st work in feather st pattern to last st half_double_crochet in last st chain 1 turn repeat row 3 & 4 until piece measures approx 8 /20 5 cm or desired length from bottom edge half_double_crochet in each chain 1 space and in the top st of the feather ch1 turn single_crochet in each st break yarn and pull through end to fasten_off leaving a long tail sew up side seam finishing weave ends in on wrong side your project will be softer and more beautiful after a gentle washing by hand in warm water and a mild soap or detergent then roll in a towel to remove excess moisture or spin dry in a washing machine for 10 seconds only
